column5: Hi Guys,  Has anyone fished LOB this summer? Dwight area? Bass/Pike?  Thanks!  skdds

Haven't fished it this year but it is mainly bass and lake trout water. There are some pike in Oxtongue river and Dwight Bay but few and far between in LOB's itself. Concentrate on the smallies in the typical summer spots.
will do. Thanks, that seems to be what most of the posts are saying as well.-skdds
